availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Charles W. Hutchen (County Judge Henderson Co)

body.p: Henderson County, Kentucky, judge. New York native. Married Charity C. Hutchen. Father of Elvira Hutchen, Francis D. Hutchen, S. H. Hutchen, and Ellen Hutchen. Printer in Hickman, Kentucky, in 1850. Presiding Judge of the Henderson County Court in Henderson County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Fulton County, Town of Hickman, p. 111. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Division No. 1, p. 1. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, Town of Henderson District, p. 11. Find A Grave, "Charles W. Hutchen (1801-1873)," Memorial #95479395, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/95479395 (accessed November 30, 2017).
